full_text: MATERIALS 7 (12) skeins of Purl Soho’s Santolina , 70% organically grown cotton, 20% rayon from bamboo, and 10% hemp. Each skein is 328 yards/ 100 grams; approximately 2000 (3640) total yards required. We used the color Golden Pollen. US 6 (4 mm), 40- or 47-inch circular needles GAUGE 20 stitches and 24 rows = 4 inches in 3 x 1 rib (see Notes) with yarn doubled SIZES Crib (Throw) Finished Dimensions: Approximately 30 (41) inches wide x 44 (58) inches long Sample: We knit the Throw size. Designed for Purl Soho by Ksenia Naidyon , the talented designer behind Life Is Cozy , where she shares patterns for her beautiful hand knits, instructions for must-know stitch patterns, and reviews on needles, books, and notions… Everything we knitters love!
